Package org.eclipse.actf.ui.util

This package contains UI utilities.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IDialogConstants
    Interface to provide commonly used Dialog messages
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractPartListener
    Abstract implementation of IPartListener2.
    AbstractUIPluginACTF
    Abstract implementation of AbstractUIPlugin.
    BrowserLaunch
    Utility class to launch the default browser in the Operation System.
    DialogSave
    Utility class to open dialog to enable users to specify target file name.
    HighlightStringListener
    Utility class to highlight Strings in the StyledText.
    ImageUtil
    Utility class to save Image into file.
    Messages  
    PlatformUIUtil
    Utility class to provide frequently used methods related to PlatformUI
    PreferenceUtils
    Utility class to launch preference page.
    ProgressContribution
    A contribution item implementation for adding ProgressBar commonly used in ACTF.

Package org.eclipse.actf.ui.util Description

This package contains UI utilities.
